newsitem.title: UK: UK Labour eyes 10 pct tax rate when possible - Brown.
newsitem.headline: UK Labour eyes 10 pct tax rate when possible - Brown.

text.p: British opposition Labour party finance spokesman Gordon Brown said on Monday he would introduce a 10 percent initial income tax rate when resources were available, if his party were to win the next election.
"The principals that should govern a tax system are that it should encourage employment, it should encourage savings and investment, and of course it should be fair," Brown told BBC radio.
"What I want to do over time, when the resources become available, is to introduce...a 10 pence (per pound) starting rate of tax," Brown said.
